item.description: On January 14, we will be discussing Marley and Me. So, if you're an animal lover, want to relax with some great people over pizza and a beer, come on by. Then on January 18th, we're going to see the Marley and Me movie which hits theaters on Dec 25. We'll probably do a matinee since it's a Sunday and will choose a theater close to Manchester. Hope you'll join us.

group.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club

item.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club December Meetup
